column3: Not sure about this.\nOne great thing Markup text files offer, is, that they are perfectly fine readable with no Markup render engine (in a standard text editor). Adding "tags" defeats that purpose IMO and may confuse pure text-editor/reader users.
Good point @jonasschnelli! When considering also the non-rendered use-case I'll have to withdraw my previous "concept ACK" :-)
Seems there is no agreement to do this, closing.
